It's honestly trash. I played about 150 hours back when this game was OK but it's been terrible for many years. Also, there's a bug where a process running in the background counts as "playing the game" meaning that I apparently have played over 500 hours of this.

This is a really fun game. If you can get 4 of your friends together and full queue it is going to be a great time. This game rewards you for learning mechanics and getting better. However, toxic people and cheaters can make some games frustrating and not fun at all
